name: 黃乾怡
objective: 本課程之目標為增進碩博士級學生對科技論文架構與撰寫，提升英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧，瞭解期刊論文投稿程序及審查要點。
schedule:
W1~4 Training in Scientific English Writing and Editing (科技英文撰寫與編修訓練)
W5~7 Structure of Scientific Papers (科技論文架構與撰寫要領)
W8~9 Utilization of Library Resources: Scopus & WOS Journal Database Searches, SciVal Research Assessment Analysis System (圖書館資源利用 Scopus & WOS 期刊資料庫查詢，SciVal 研究評估分析系統) 
W10 Key Points for Journal paper Submission: Collection and Sharing of Author Instructions from Major Journals in the Field, Journal Manuscript Practice (Following Journal Formats), Writing a Cover Letter 期刊論文投稿要點，領域重要期刊 author instruction 蒐集分享、期刊 manuscript 實作練習 (依期刊格式)、撰寫 Cover letter
W11-12  Professional Paper Editing (專業論文潤稿): Dr. Wallace team lectures
W13~18 Practical Exercises and Sharing in Scientific Paper Writing (科技論文實作練習與分享): 論文標題訂定、撰寫 Abstract、Introduction、Methods、Results、Discussion、Conclusions、Recommendations for Future Studies、Reference
scorePolicy:
實作練習 Practical Exercises (含 Oral presentation) 50%
Attendance and Class Participation 出席與上課表現 50%
materials: 自編講義 & 柯泰德 (Ted Knoy) 「科技英文編修訓練手冊 -- 進階」清蔚科技出版事業部
